metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38578 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Existing CommBuffer checks in SmmEntryPoint will not catch underflow when computing BufferSize.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38578` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

efi-shell-aa64 - 2023.02-2
efi-shell-arm - 2023.02-2
efi-shell-ia32 - 2023.02-2
efi-shell-x64 - 2023.02-2
ovmf - 2023.02-2
ovmf-ia32 - 2023.02-2
qemu-efi - 2023.02-2
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2023.02-2
qemu-efi-arm - 2023.02-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2023.02-2').
